'''Andy''' was one of the lawyers who worked with the crash survivors after the plane crash.

==History==
===Emotional Damages===
Andy worked with the doctors to determine the emotional damages they would be seeking during the lawsuit. In particular, he wanted to talk to Cristina, who was reluctant to relive the experience and told him she had no lasting damage aside from her shoulder hurting sometimes and some PTSD.

==Career==
Andy is a lawyer.
